New Records: Suryakumar Yadav hit an unbeaten 50 off 49 balls, including some specular shots
Arshdeep Singh took a career-best 4-9 in the match
Key Match Events: USA were all out for 110 in 20 overs
Suryakumar Yadav's knock was crucial after India lost early wickets
Arshdeep Singh dismissed Nitish at a crucial moment with a superb catch
Pre-Game Insights: USA captain Aaron Jones mentioned the pitch suited their seamers and spin options
India captain Rohit Sharma emphasized the importance of bowler discipline and the quality of their attack
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma highlighted India's maturity and ability to manage pressure
Aaron Jones praised his team's effort and discipline despite the loss
Commentators noted the competitive nature of the match and India's dominance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of 31,219 fans at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium
The New York pitch was noted for being challenging for batters but favorable for fast bowlers
